page.description: Returns a pointer to a toolbar.

discussion.p: The *[xb:Toolbar::get()]* function returns a pointer to the specified Toolbar_Name.
A toolbar's name can be determined by undocking the toolbar and checking the title that appears in the toolbar title bar.
